95 //Compute the edge length
96 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
97 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
98 void CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_length( double u1, double u2, E * e )
99 {
100  e->length() = exp(u1) + exp(u2);
101 };

103 
104 //Calculate corner angle
105 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
106 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
107 double CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_cosine_law( double a, double b, double c )
108 {
109  double cs = ( a*a + b * b - c * c )/( 2.0 * a * b );
110  assert( cs <= 1.0 && cs >= -1.0 );
111  return acos( cs );
112 };
113 
114 
115 //Calculate edge weight
116 
117 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
118 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
119 void CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_edge_weight()
120 {
121  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshEdgeIterator eiter( this->m_pMesh ); !eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
122  {
123  E * e = *eiter;
124  e->weight() = 0.0;
125  }
126 
127  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshFaceIterator fiter( this->m_pMesh ) ; !fiter.end(); fiter ++ )
128  {
129  F * f = *fiter;
130 
131  double r[3];
132  int i = 0;
133  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::FaceHalfedgeIterator hiter( f ); !hiter.end(); ++hiter )
134  {
135  H * he = *hiter;
136  V * v = this->m_pMesh->halfedgeTarget(he);
137  r[i++] = exp( v->u() );
138  }
139 
140  double w = sqrt(r[0]*r[1]*r[2]/(r[0]+r[1]+r[2]));
141 
142  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::FaceEdgeIterator eiter(f); !eiter.end(); ++ eiter )
143  {
144  E * e = * eiter;
145  e->weight() += w/e->length();
146  }
147  }
148 };
149 
150 //set target curvature
151 
152 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
153 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
154 void CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_set_target_curvature()
155 {
156  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( this->m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
157  {
158  V * v = *viter;
159  v->target_k() = 0;
160  }
161 
162  //typedef typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::CLoop CLoop1;
163  //typename std::vector<CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::CLoop*>& pLs = this->m_boundary.loops();
164  //typename std::vector<CLoop1*>& pLs = this->m_boundary.loops();
165  typename std::vector<CLoop<V,E,F,H>*>& pLs = this->m_boundary.loops();
166 
167 
168  int id = 0;
169 
170  //for( typename std::vector<CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::CLoop*>::iterator liter = pLs.begin(); liter != pLs.end(); liter++)
171  for( typename std::vector<CLoop<V,E,F,H>*>::iterator liter = pLs.begin(); liter != pLs.end(); liter++)
172  {
173  typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::CLoop * pL = *liter;
174  typename std::list<H*> & pHes = pL->halfedges();
175 
176  double sum = 0;
177  double inv_sum = 0;
178 
179  for( typename std::list<H*>::iterator hiter = pHes.begin(); hiter != pHes.end(); hiter ++ )
180  {
181  H * he = *hiter;
182  E * pe = this->m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge( he );
183 
184  sum += pe->length();
185  inv_sum += 1/pe->length();
186  }
187 
188  for( typename std::list<H*>::iterator hiter = pHes.begin(); hiter != pHes.end(); hiter ++ )
189  {
190  H * ce = *hiter;
191  V * pv = this->m_pMesh->halfedgeTarget( ce );
192  H * he = this->m_pMesh->vertexMostCcwInHalfEdge( pv );
193  H * te = this->m_pMesh->vertexMostClwOutHalfEdge( pv );
194 
195  double L = ( this->m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge(he)->length() + this->m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge( te )->length() )/2.0;
196 
197  // map all boundaries to circular holes
198  if( id == 0 )
199  {
200  double tk = 2*PI*L/sum;
201  pv->target_k() = tk;
202  }
203  else
204  {
205  double tk = -2*PI*L/sum;
206  pv->target_k() = tk;
207  }
208  }
209  id ++;
210  }
211 
212 };
213 
214 //compute metric
215 
216 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
217 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
218 void CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_metric()
219 {
220 
221  //double error = 1e-6;
222  double error = 5e-4;
223 
224  this->_calculate_edge_length();
225 
226  while( true )
227  {
228  _set_target_curvature();
229  this->_Newton( error, 1 );
230  //break;
231  if( _flow( error ) ) break;
232 }
233 
234 
235 };
236 
237 //gradient flow method
238 
239 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
240 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
241 bool CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_flow( double error_threshold )
242 {
243  int num = this->m_pMesh->numVertices();
244 
245  for( int k = 0; k < 64; k ++ )
246  {
247  this-> _calculate_edge_length();
248  _set_target_curvature();
249  _calculate_edge_weight();
250 
251  this->_calculate_corner_angle();
252  this->_calculate_vertex_curvature();
253 
254  double error = this->_calculate_curvature_error();
255  printf("Current error is %f\r\n", error );
256 
257  if( error < error_threshold) return true;
258 
259 
260  //set b
261  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( this->m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); ++ viter )
262  {
263  V * v = *viter;
264  double dif = v->target_k() - v->k();
265  v->u() += dif * 2e-2;
266  }
267  }
268  return false;
269 };
270 
271 //normalization
272 
273 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
274 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
275 void CTangentialRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_normalization( Eigen::VectorXd & x, int num )
276 {
277 
278  double s = 0;
279  for(int i = 0; i < num; i ++ )
280  {
281  s += x(i);
282  }
283  s /= num;
284 
285  for (int i = 0; i < num; i++)
286  {
287  x(i) -= s;
288  }
289 };
290 
291 }
